content: a crochet snowflake ornament is so much fun for christmas or the winter season this crochet pattern is easy to make with worsted weight 100% cotton the type used for a dishcloth so it works up very quickly because medium weight cotton yarn is used it retains some stiffness what that means is you really don t need to further stiffen it with a stiffening product like glue and water there is a step-by-step tutorial video for this pattern
